content.new:
I’m trying to run the simulation in debug mode:

```
ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign headless:=true worldName:=urban_qual robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=COSTAR_HUSKY_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 enableGroundTruth:=true
```

and `/X1/pose/transform/translation` stays at \(0, 0, 0\) with occasional flashes to small values about \(0.25, 0.28, 0.02\) while the robot travels deep into the tunnels. I expected it to show accurate position of `X1` in the world. Without `enableGroundTruth:=true` it oscillates around \(0.25, 0.28, 0.02\) and again doesn’t follow robots progress.
